source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE  VIEW source1
AS SELECT * FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_additional_data;
CREATE OR REPLACE  VIEW source2
AS SELECT * FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_add_additional_data;

CREATE OR REPLACE  VIEW final_source as
select 
    CASE
        WHEN source1.appealrefnumber IS NOT NULL
        THEN source1.appealrefnumber
        ELSE source2.appealrefnumber
    END as appealrefnumberID,
 source1.*, source2.level from source1 full outer join source2 on source1.appealrefnumber = source2.appealrefnumber;

select count(*) from source1
select count(*) from source2
select count(*) from final_source

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new 

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN ST1.AppealRefNumber IS NULL
        THEN T3.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END as AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    ST1.appealrefnumber	AS	AppealRefNumber,
    ST1.lastmodified	AS	LastModified,
    ST1.decisiondate	AS	DecisionDate,
    ST1.decisionsubmitdate	AS	DecisionSubmitDate,
    ST1.bespokeindicator	AS	BespokeIndicator,
    ST1.bespoketargetdate	AS	BespokeTargetDate,
    ST1.processingstate	AS	ProcessingState,
    ST1.linkstatus	AS	LinkStatus,
    ST1.casecloseddate	AS	CaseClosedDate,
    ST1.pcsappealwithdrawndate	AS	PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    ST1.numberofresidences	AS	NumberOfResidences,
    ST1.appealsdocumentscomplete	AS	AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    ST1.questionnairereceived	AS	QuestionnaireReceived,
    ST1.lpaconditionsreceived	AS	LPAConditionsReceived,
    ST1.lpaconditionsforwarded	AS	LPAConditionsForwarded,
    ST1.statementsdue	AS	StatementsDue,
    ST1.lpastatementsubmitted	AS	LPAStatementSubmitted,
    ST1.lpastatementforwarded	AS	LPAStatementForwarded,
    ST1.appellantstatementsubmitted	AS	AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    ST1.appellantstatementforwarded	AS	AppellantStatementForwarded,
    ST1.finalcommentsdue	AS	FinalCommentsDue,
    ST1.lpacommentssubmitted	AS	LPACommentsSubmitted,
    ST1.lpacommentsforwarded	AS	LPACommentsForwarded,
    ST1.statementofcommongrounddue	AS	StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    ST1.statementofcommongroundreceived	AS	StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    ST1.appellantcommentssubmitted	AS	AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    ST1.appellantcommentsforwarded	AS	AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ST1.thirdpartyrepsdue	AS	ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ST1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded	AS	ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    ST1.sitenoticesent	AS	SiteNoticeSent,
    ST1.proofsdue	AS	ProofsDue,
    ST1.lpaproofssubmitted	AS	LPAProofsSubmitted,
    ST1.lpaproofsforwarded	AS	LPAProofsForwarded,
    ST1.appellantsproofssubmitted	AS	AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    ST1.appellantsproofsforwarded	AS	AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    ST1.areaofsiteinhectares	AS	AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    ST1.dateofdecisionifissued	AS	DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    ST1.typeofapplication	AS	TypeOfApplication,
    ST1.appealsourceindicator	AS	AppealSourceIndicator,
    ST1.developmentorallegation	AS	DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    ST1.amountdue	AS	AmountDue,
    ST1.sitegreenbelt	AS	SiteGreenBelt,
    ST1.lpaapplicationreference	AS	LPAApplicationReference,
    ST1.lpaapplicationdate	AS	LPAApplicationDate,
    ST1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered	AS	DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    ST1.daterecovered	AS	DateRecovered,
    ST1.callindate	AS	CallInDate,
    ST2.caseprocess	AS	CaseProcess,
    ST2.caseworkmarker	AS	CaseworkMarker,
    ST2.costsappliedforindicator	AS	CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    ST2.level	AS	Level,
    ST2.procedureappellant	AS	ProcedureAppellant,
    ST2.procedurelpa	AS	ProcedureLPA,
    ST2.proceduredetermineddate	AS	ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    ST2.targetdate	AS	TargetDate,
    ST2.agriculturalholding	AS	AgriculturalHolding,
    ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding	AS	DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres	AS	FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting	AS	SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing	AS	SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade	AS	HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    ST2.incarelatestoca	AS	InCARelatesToCA,
    ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite	AS	InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    ST2.isfloodinganissue	AS	IsFloodingAnIssue,
    ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb	AS	IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    ST2.sitewithinsssi	AS	SiteWithinSSSI,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(ST1.appealrefnumber,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lastmodified,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.decisiondate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.decisionsubmitdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.bespokeindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.bespoketargetdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.processingstate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.linkstatus,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.casecloseddate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.numberofresidences,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appealsdocumentscomplete,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.questionnairereceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaconditionsreceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaconditionsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpastatementsubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpastatementforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantstatementsubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantstatementforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.finalcommentsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpacommentssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpacommentsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementofcommongrounddue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementofcommongroundreceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantcommentssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantcommentsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.thirdpartyrepsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.sitenoticesent,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.proofsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaproofssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaproofsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantsproofssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantsproofsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.areaofsiteinhectares,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.dateofdecisionifissued,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.typeofapplication,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appealsourceindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.developmentorallegation,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.amountdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.sitegreenbelt,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaapplicationreference,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaapplicationdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.daterecovered,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.callindate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.caseprocess,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.caseworkmarker,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.costsappliedforindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.level,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.procedureappellant,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.procedurelpa,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.proceduredetermineddate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.targetdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.agriculturalholding,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.incarelatestoca,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.isfloodinganissue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitewithinsssi,'.'))) as RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN ST1.appealrefnumber = T3.AppealRefNumber AND md5(concat(IFNULL(ST1.appealrefnumber,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lastmodified,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.decisiondate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.decisionsubmitdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.bespokeindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.bespoketargetdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.processingstate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.linkstatus,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.casecloseddate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.numberofresidences,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appealsdocumentscomplete,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.questionnairereceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaconditionsreceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaconditionsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpastatementsubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpastatementforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantstatementsubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantstatementforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.finalcommentsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpacommentssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpacommentsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementofcommongrounddue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementofcommongroundreceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantcommentssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantcommentsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.thirdpartyrepsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.sitenoticesent,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.proofsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaproofssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaproofsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantsproofssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantsproofsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.areaofsiteinhectares,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.dateofdecisionifissued,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.typeofapplication,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appealsourceindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.developmentorallegation,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.amountdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.sitegreenbelt,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaapplicationreference,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaapplicationdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.daterecovered,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.callindate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.caseprocess,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.caseworkmarker,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.costsappliedforindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.level,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.procedureappellant,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.procedurelpa,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.proceduredetermineddate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.targetdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.agriculturalholding,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.incarelatestoca,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.isfloodinganissue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitewithinsssi,'.'))) <> T3.RowID   -- same row, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.AppealRefNumber IS NULL -- new AppealRefNumber
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN ST1.appealrefnumber IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive
    

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_additional_data ST1
INNER JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_add_additional_data ST2 ON ST1.appealrefnumber = ST2.appealrefnumber
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim T3 ON ST1.appealrefnumber = T3.AppealRefNumber AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN ST1.appealrefnumber = T3.AppealRefNumber AND md5(concat(IFNULL(ST1.appealrefnumber,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lastmodified,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.decisiondate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.decisionsubmitdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.bespokeindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.bespoketargetdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.processingstate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.linkstatus,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.casecloseddate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.pcsappealwithdrawndate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.numberofresidences,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appealsdocumentscomplete,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.questionnairereceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaconditionsreceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaconditionsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpastatementsubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpastatementforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantstatementsubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantstatementforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.finalcommentsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpacommentssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpacommentsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementofcommongrounddue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.statementofcommongroundreceived,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantcommentssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantcommentsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.thirdpartyrepsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.thirdpartyrepsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.sitenoticesent,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.proofsdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaproofssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaproofsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantsproofssubmitted,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appellantsproofsforwarded,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.areaofsiteinhectares,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.dateofdecisionifissued,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.typeofapplication,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.appealsourceindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.developmentorallegation,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.amountdue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.sitegreenbelt,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaapplicationreference,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.lpaapplicationdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.datenotrecoveredorderecovered,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.daterecovered,'.'),	IFNULL(ST1.callindate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.caseprocess,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.caseworkmarker,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.costsappliedforindicator,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.level,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.procedureappellant,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.procedurelpa,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.proceduredetermineddate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.targetdate,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.agriculturalholding,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.developmentaffectsettingoflistedbuilding,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.floorspaceinsquaremetres,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitegridreferenceeasting,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitegridreferencenorthing,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.historicbuildinggrantmade,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.incarelatestoca,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.inspectorneedtoentersite,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.isfloodinganissue,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.isthesitewithinanaonb,'.'),	IFNULL(ST2.sitewithinsssi,'.'))) <> T3.RowID  -- same row, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T3.AppealRefNumber IS NULL -- new AppealRefNumber
                THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN ST1.appealrefnumber IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total amount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the process of loading the data

# Run tests to check integrity of data by comparison of codes
- This script checks for the total list of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the list for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    LastModified,
    DecisionDate,
    DecisionSubmitDate,
    BespokeIndicator,
    BespokeTargetDate,
    ProcessingState,
    LinkStatus,
    CaseClosedDate,
    PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    NumberOfResidences,
    AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    LPAConditionsReceived,
    LPAConditionsForwarded,
    StatementsDue,
    LPAStatementSubmitted,
    LPAStatementForwarded,
    AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    AppellantStatementForwarded,
    FinalCommentsDue,
    LPACommentsSubmitted,
    LPACommentsForwarded,
    StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    SiteNoticeSent,
    ProofsDue,
    LPAProofsSubmitted,
    LPAProofsForwarded,
    AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    TypeOfApplication,
    AppealSourceIndicator,
    DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    AmountDue,
    SiteGreenBelt,
    LPAApplicationReference,
    LPAApplicationDate,
    DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    DateRecovered,
    CallInDate,
    CaseProcess,
    CaseworkMarker,
    CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    Level,
    ProcedureAppellant,
    ProcedureLPA,
    ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    TargetDate,
    AgriculturalHolding,
    DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    InCARelatesToCA,
    InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    IsFloodingAnIssue,
    IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    SiteWithinSSSI,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    LastModified,
    DecisionDate,
    DecisionSubmitDate,
    BespokeIndicator,
    BespokeTargetDate,
    ProcessingState,
    LinkStatus,
    CaseClosedDate,
    PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    NumberOfResidences,
    AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    LPAConditionsReceived,
    LPAConditionsForwarded,
    StatementsDue,
    LPAStatementSubmitted,
    LPAStatementForwarded,
    AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    AppellantStatementForwarded,
    FinalCommentsDue,
    LPACommentsSubmitted,
    LPACommentsForwarded,
    StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    SiteNoticeSent,
    ProofsDue,
    LPAProofsSubmitted,
    LPAProofsForwarded,
    AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    TypeOfApplication,
    AppealSourceIndicator,
    DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    AmountDue,
    SiteGreenBelt,
    LPAApplicationReference,
    LPAApplicationDate,
    DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    DateRecovered,
    CallInDate,
    CaseProcess,
    CaseworkMarker,
    CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    Level,
    ProcedureAppellant,
    ProcedureLPA,
    ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    TargetDate,
    AgriculturalHolding,
    DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    InCARelatesToCA,
    InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    IsFloodingAnIssue,
    IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    SiteWithinSSSI,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim
WHERE AppealRefNumber IN (SELECT AppealRefNumber FROM casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_new WHERE AllAppealsAdditionalDataID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsAdditionalDataID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim AS Target
USING casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID = Target.AllAppealsAdditionalDataID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AllAppealsAdditionalDataID NULLS LAST) AS AllAppealsAdditionalDataID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    LastModified,
    DecisionDate,
    DecisionSubmitDate,
    BespokeIndicator,
    BespokeTargetDate,
    ProcessingState,
    LinkStatus,
    CaseClosedDate,
    PCSAppealWithdrawnDate,
    NumberOfResidences,
    AppealsDocumentsComplete,
    QuestionnaireReceived,
    LPAConditionsReceived,
    LPAConditionsForwarded,
    StatementsDue,
    LPAStatementSubmitted,
    LPAStatementForwarded,
    AppellantStatementSubmitted,
    AppellantStatementForwarded,
    FinalCommentsDue,
    LPACommentsSubmitted,
    LPACommentsForwarded,
    StatementOfCommonGroundDue,
    StatementOfCommonGroundReceived,
    AppellantCommentsSubmitted,
    AppellantCommentsForwarded,
    ThirdPartyRepsDue,
    ThirdPartyRepsForwarded,
    SiteNoticeSent,
    ProofsDue,
    LPAProofsSubmitted,
    LPAProofsForwarded,
    AppellantsProofsSubmitted,
    AppellantsProofsForwarded,
    AreaOfSiteInHectares,
    DateOfDecisionIfIssued,
    TypeOfApplication,
    AppealSourceIndicator,
    DevelopmentOrAllegation,
    AmountDue,
    SiteGreenBelt,
    LPAApplicationReference,
    LPAApplicationDate,
    DateNotRecoveredOrDeRecovered,
    DateRecovered,
    CallInDate,
    CaseProcess,
    CaseworkMarker,
    CostsAppliedForIndicator,
    Level,
    ProcedureAppellant,
    ProcedureLPA,
    ProcedureDeterminedDate,
    TargetDate,
    AgriculturalHolding,
    DevelopmentAffectSettingOfListedBuilding,
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres,
    SiteGridReferenceEasting,
    SiteGridReferenceNorthing,
    HistoricBuildingGrantMade,
    InCARelatesToCA,
    InspectorNeedToEnterSite,
    IsFloodingAnIssue,
    IsTheSiteWithinAnAONB,
    SiteWithinSSSI,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_additional_data_dim;
This last cell is just to check count of rows between source and target on first load, to be deleted!
